item.title: A Few Tips for Xaringan
item.description: Add CSS Codes within RMarkdown When using Xaringan to create slides, one may include a custom.css or use the xaringanthemer package to change styles in whole or by part. Recently, I found another trick that allow you make changes to styles within your rmarkdown file. It’s very simple. You simply only need to add a CSS code chunk1 at the beginning of your content.
